summary: This mod allows you to start off a new character with the ability to turn into a werewolf from the start and it also has some stat and skill changes to be more werewolf like.
descriptionHtml:
This mod allows you to start off a new character with the ability to turn into a werewolf from the start and it also has some stat and skill changes to be more werewolf like. Appearance is the Nord race. Should be compatible with just about everything, its a simple race mod. 
[b]Specials: [/b]
Adrenaline Rush (Stamina regenerates 10x faster for 60 seconds, once per day) 
Claws (Claws do 12 damage.) 
Beast Form (Ability to turn into Werewolf.) 
[b]Skill Bonus Distribution: [/b]
Heavy armor: 10 
One-handed: 5 
Two-handed: 5 
Smithing: 5 
Sneak: 5 
Lockpicking 5: 
[b]Base Stats: [/b]
Health: 100 
Magicka: 50 
Stamina: 150
http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=625773684
author: Leth
